articles.title: LAPD officer hit with felony charges after allegedly skydiving while collecting full disability benefits
articles.summary: An LAPD officer allegedly went skydiving while collecting disability benefits for a 2023 injury. Christopher Carnahan now faces felony fraud charges in court.
